xmp_schema.description: $$$/xmp/aux_description=Properties that describe the equipment used to produce EXIF data.
xmp_schema.label: $$$/xmp/aux_label=EXIF Schema For Additional EXIF Properties

xmp_property.name: Lens
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/aux/Lens_description=A description of the lens used to take the photograph. For example, "70-200 mm f/2.8-4.0".
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/aux/Lens_label=Lens

xmp_property.name: LensID
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/aux/LensID_description=The camera maker specifix identification number of the used lens
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/aux/LensID_label=Lens ID

xmp_property.name: LensInfo
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/aux/LensInfo_description=The minimum focal length, maximum focal length, minimum F number in the minimum focal length, and minimum F number in the maximum focal length, which are specification information for the lens that was used in photography.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/aux/LensInfo_label=Lens Info

xmp_property.name: LensSerialNumber
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/aux/LensSerialNumber_description=The serial number of the lens used to take the photograph.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/aux/LensSerialNumber_label=Lens Serial Number

xmp_property.name: OwnerName
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/aux/OwnerName_description=The owner of a camera used in photography.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/aux/OwnerName_label=Camera Owner Name

xmp_property.name: SerialNumber
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/aux/SerialNumber_description=The serial number of the camera or camera body used to take the photograph.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/aux/SerialNumber_label=Serial Number
